resources.string: There needs to be a stream playing first.
Better stay inside and relax while listening to the rain
Fall asleep and drift away listening to the waves
Lay back in bed and listen to a calm creek and birds
Meditate and enter a state of deep relaxation
Couldn\'t open stream, Check your internet connection. If this continues to fail please contact me.
Relaxing music to help you sleep and meditate
Listen to bi-natural beats and control your sleep
Must be nice to stay inside when its cold out
Zoom past the event horizon into a new dimension
